title: Cultivated Dream Orchard Adventure #45
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Orchard Entrance Gate
rooms.description: You stand before a magnificent orchard where trees bear glowing fruit that pulse with dream energy. The air shimmers with possibility and smells of honey and starlight. An ornate wooden gate blocks the path forward, and a small gardener's shed stands to one side. Luminescent butterflies drift between the trees.

items.name: weathered gardener's shed
items.description: A small wooden shed with tools and supplies for tending the dream orchard

items.name: dream cultivation manual
items.description: A leather bound guide to growing dreams in the orchard
items.text: Dream Cultivation Guide: The orchard was founded in year 739 by the Dreamweaver Celestia. Three types of dreams grow here: Hope Dreams (golden fruit), Memory Dreams (silver fruit), and Prophecy Dreams (violet fruit). The master gardener is known as the Keeper of Visions.

items.name: enchanted pruning shears
items.description: Silver shears that can cut through magical barriers and harvest dream fruit

items.name: carved welcome sign
items.description: An ornate wooden sign with information about the orchard
items.text: Welcome to the Cultivated Dream Orchard. Established 739. Tended by the Keeper of Visions. Please respect the dream trees and harvest only ripe fruit. The Harvest Sanctuary awaits those who understand the orchard's secrets.

items.name: wooden supply crate
items.description: A crate filled with gardening supplies and equipment

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: An old brass key with a tree symbol engraved on it

items.name: gardener's locked chest
items.description: A sturdy chest secured with a brass lock

items.name: orchard history scroll
items.description: A scroll detailing the history of the dream orchard
items.text: The Cultivated Dream Orchard was created by Dreamweaver Celestia, who planted the first dream seeds in the Sacred Grove. The most powerful dreams are stored in the Harvest Sanctuary, where only those who prove their knowledge may enter.

items.name: ornate wooden gate
items.description: A beautiful gate carved with dream symbols, overgrown with magical vines

rooms.name: Sacred Dream Grove
rooms.description: The heart of the orchard, where ancient trees with silver bark and golden leaves grow in perfect circles. Dream fruit hangs from every branch, glowing softly. In the center stands a stone fountain flowing with liquid starlight. Three magnificent trees dominate the grove, each bearing a different type of dream fruit. A grand archway leads to the Harvest Sanctuary.

items.name: ancient hope tree
items.description: A majestic tree bearing golden fruit that radiates warmth and optimism
items.text: Plaque at base: 'The Hope Tree - First planted by Celestia. Its golden fruit brings courage and joy to all who taste it.'

items.name: ancient memory tree
items.description: A graceful tree with silver fruit that shimmer with captured moments
items.text: Plaque at base: 'The Memory Tree - Preserves precious moments in silver fruit. Each fruit contains a cherished memory from the Sacred Grove.'

items.name: ancient prophecy tree
items.description: A mysterious tree bearing violet fruit that pulse with future visions
items.text: Plaque at base: 'The Prophecy Tree - Its violet fruit reveals glimpses of what may come. The Keeper of Visions tends it with great care.'

items.name: starlight fountain
items.description: A fountain flowing with liquid light, surrounded by flowering dream vines

items.name: ripe golden dream fruit
items.description: A perfectly ripe hope dream fruit glowing with golden light, one of the sacred artifacts

items.name: Keeper's personal journal
items.description: A journal belonging to the Keeper of Visions
items.text: Journal Entry: I am the Keeper of Visions, guardian of this sacred orchard. To enter the Harvest Sanctuary, one must answer the three questions of cultivation: Who founded this orchard? Where do the most precious memories grow? What is my title as guardian?

items.name: carved stone pedestal
items.description: A pedestal with a hollow space perfect for placing dream fruit

items.name: ripe violet dream fruit
items.description: A perfectly ripe prophecy dream fruit pulsing with violet energy, another sacred artifact

items.name: grand sanctuary archway
items.description: A magnificent archway covered in flowering vines and glowing runes. Three questions are inscribed in the stone.

password_questions.question: Who founded this orchard?
password_questions.hint: Check the cultivation manual and orchard history

password_questions.question: Where do the most precious memories grow?
password_questions.hint: Read the Memory Tree's plaque and the orchard history

password_questions.question: What is the guardian's title?
password_questions.hint: The welcome sign and journal mention this title

rooms.name: Harvest Sanctuary
rooms.description: You have reached the legendary Harvest Sanctuary! A breathtaking chamber where the most powerful dream fruits are stored in crystalline cases. The walls are lined with shelves holding dreams of every color imaginable. In the center, a portal of swirling dream energy offers passage back to the waking world. The air thrums with concentrated dream magic.

items.name: crystalline display cases
items.description: Beautiful cases holding the most precious dream fruits ever cultivated

items.name: archive of dreams
items.description: Shelves containing thousands of preserved dreams in glowing containers
items.text: Archive Label: The Cultivated Dream Orchard's complete collection. Every dream ever grown, harvested, and preserved. A testament to Dreamweaver Celestia's vision and the Keeper's dedication.

items.name: portal to waking world
items.description: A shimmering portal that leads back to reality, activated by the power of dream fruits

rooms.name: The Awakening
rooms.description: You step through the portal and find yourself in a beautiful garden at dawn. The dream orchard fades like morning mist, but you hold in your hands the golden and violet dream fruits - tangible proof of your journey. The dreams you cultivated will stay with you forever.

items.name: dawn garden
items.description: A peaceful garden where dreams and reality meet in perfect harmony

rooms.win_message: You have successfully navigated the Cultivated Dream Orchard and harvested the sacred dream fruits! The golden fruit fills you with hope, and the violet fruit grants you glimpses of wonderful possibilities. Dreamweaver Celestia's legacy lives on through you. You win!
